Descr: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).
The location of the event, organization or action.
The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

An offer to provide this item (e.g. an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, or give away tickets to an event). Can use eligibleCustomerType and eligibleDuration properties to express any special offers.
A performer at the event (e.g. a presenter, musician, musical group or actor).
An Event that is part of this event (e.g. a conference event includes many presentations, each of which is a subEvent of the conference).
An Event that this event is a part of (e.g. a collection of individual music performances might each have a music festival as their superEvent).
